text: Ross E. Zumwalt (born July 18, 1943)https://www.familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:KRN1-M64https://www.familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:2QXN- MV5 is an American pathologist, focusing in forensic pathology and accreditation of forensic pathology training programs Zumwalt was teaching at the University of New Mexico and is an Elected Fellow of the American Association for the Advancement of Science. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Fellows of the American Association for the Advancement of Science Category:American pathologists Category:Wabash College alumni Category:University of Illinois alumni Category:Living people
title: Ross Zumwalt
